text: The Time with You () is a 1948 German drama film directed by George Hurdalek and starring Eva Ingeborg Scholz, Heinz Klingenberg and Peter Bürger.Bock & Bergfelder p. 79 It was made at the Bavaria Studios in Munich. The film's sets were designed by the art director Gerhard Ladner. ==Cast== * Eva Ingeborg Scholz as Johanna * Heinz Klingenberg as Konrad Berger * Peter Bürger as Friedel, sein Kind * Dieter Jeschke as Rolf, sein Kind * Gisela Trowe as Hilde Streuber * Fita Benkhoff as Frau Beckel * Günther Lüders as Heinrich Streuber * Paul Dahlke as Ewald * Edith Oß as Toni * Petra Unkel as Agathe * Walter Janssen as Studiendirektor * Nicolas Koline as Petroff * Fritz Odemar as Lawyer * Edith Schultze-Westrum as Fürsorgehelferin * Erhard Siedel as Standesbeamter * Isa Vermehren as Frau Hajek * Kurt Waitzmann as Ein junger Mann == References == == Bibliography == * Bock, Hans-Michael & Bergfelder, Tim.
